content:
I got a bit ahead of myself! I didn't receive your response, and I started planning an itinerary anyway!

Please disregard my previous message, and let's start fresh! I'd love to hear more about your interests, preferences, and what you're looking to get out of your trip to New York City.

What are your top interests, and what would you like to experience during your trip? Are there any specific landmarks, neighborhoods, or activities you're interested in? Let me know, and I'll create a personalized guide tailored to your needs!
